data.text: @TIME He was a great story teller and I loved watching. But how could he be so selfish taking his life and leaving his sweet daughter as an orphan.

@TIME I don’t understand why he did this when he leaves behind a family, son, longtime girlfriend - his abilities to bring the entire world 🌎 together; even if it was just by watching his show-he took us and made us feel we could beeak bread, share a glass of wine in parts unknown
@TIME My condolences. I never met him, but read, and watched, his every word. The episode of your program with him was a delight. Why??????
@TIME So sad for Eric. Condolences for the loss of your friend.

@TIME Devastating. This breaks my heart. I hope that @Bourdain has found peace. He was so much to so many people - I am so sorry he wasn't able to go on anymore. I'm sorry he couldn't wait until tomorrow or the next day after that or the next day after that. #Hope
